account-activation: HooYah! You're email has been validated!
appearance-label: Customise the appearance of your Upvotes, Roadmap and What's New interface to match your brand's look and feel.
company-label: Share your company details with us so that we can customise ProductHQ just for you.
default-domain-name-label: Once configured, add this link to your site to display the upvote, roadmap, and what's new features. We recommend adding it to your main menu or footer.
description-label: Describe your idea and how it works
error.account_activation: D'Oh! The information you provide does not match.
error.account_details_confirm_password.m: Confirm password does not match with new password.
error-client.bad-request: Ooops! Something went wrong. Please try again.
error-client.unnauthorized: Ooops! Something went wrong. Please try again.
error.company_name.invalid: Please enter a company name between 2 and 100 characters.
error.company_name.length: Please enter a company name between 2 and 100 characters.
error.confirm_password.mismatch: The passwords do not match. Please try again.
error.domain.invalid: This is not unique. Please choose a different subdomain.
error.domain.length: Please enter a subdomain between 3 and 30 characters.
error.email_not_found: Email not associated with any account.
error.expiration.invalid: Expiration should not be past date.
error.feedback.title: Title name is empty.
error.first_name.length: Please enter a name between 2 and 100 characters.
error.full_name.length: Please enter a name between 2 and 100 characters.
error.invalid_hex_value: This is not a valid HEX value.
error.invalid_sign_in_page: This is the public board login. If you are an admin, sign in using THIS page.
error.invalid_user_type: This email address is already taken. If you are an admin, please log on to the admin portal.
error.last_name.length: Please enter a name between 2 and 100 characters.
error.no.account.exist: No account with these details exist.
error.password.complexity: Your password should be a minimum of 8 characters, 1 uppercase, 1 lowercase, 1 number, and 1 symbol.
error.prices.invalid: You are already subscribed to this plan.
error.purchased_lifetime_deal.found: You are already purchased to a lifetime deal.
error.reset_password: Password does not match or meet the complexity rules.
error.roadmap_setting.not_allowed: There should be one remaining column.
error.subscribed_plan.found: You are already subscribed to a plan.
error.tag.name: Tag name is empty.
modules-label: By default, these modules are turned on (purple) which means all features are visible to public view. When the toggles are turned off, the feature is hidden from public view.
no-specific-persons-label: No specific persons have been invited yet, invite now!
no-team-members-label: No members have been invited yet, invite now!
StartAProject.email.string.email: Don't worry, we only need this to respond to your inquiry
StartAProject.company.string.min: Sorry but we need your formal company name
StartAProject.confirmation: Thanks! Our team's looking into your inquiry and will get back soon.
StartAProject.message.string.min: We would need a minimum viable piece of information please.
StartAProject.name.any.empty: I mean, how else should we call you by?
StartAProject.name.string.min: I mean, how else should we call you by?
StartAProject.phone.string.min: Sorry but we need your country and area codes as well
success.email_verification: Please check your email for email confirmation.
success.reset_password_confirmation: Awesome, you've successfully updated your password.
tags-heading-label: One per line or separated by a comma. Tags added will appear in the list below.
team-member-label: Admins can change company ownership or billing settings as well as inviting and removing other members.
tracking-label: Integrating ProductHQ on your web application is easy!
whitelist-first-label: Add the websites, pages, or subdomains that will use tracking.
whitelist-second-label: To whitelist a page or subdomain, paste in the specific URL and uncheck 'Include all website pages'. You can use * for a wildcard.
